titleStmt.title: The ordre of my Lorde Mayor, the aldermen & the shiriffes, for their metings and wearynge of theyr apparell throughout the yeare
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 193:5 as STC 16705++ and at reel 2098:18 as STC (2nd ed.) 16705.7.
